trans-unit.source: Connect to SQL Database by using Python on Windows
trans-unit.target: Connect to SQL Database by using Python on Windows

trans-unit.source: Presents a Python code sample you can use to connect to Azure SQL Database from a Windows client. The sample uses the pymssql driver.
trans-unit.target: Presents a Python code sample you can use to connect to Azure SQL Database from a Windows client. The sample uses the pymssql driver.

trans-unit.source: This topic presents a code sample written in Python.
trans-unit.target: This topic presents a code sample written in Python.

trans-unit.source: The sample runs on a Windows computer.
trans-unit.target: The sample runs on a Windows computer.

trans-unit.source: The sample and connects to Azure SQL Database by using the pymssql driver.
trans-unit.target: The sample and connects to Azure SQL Database by using the pymssql driver.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Python 2.7.6</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Python 2.7.6</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: Install <linkText>pymssql</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: Install <linkText>pymssql</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: Make sure you choose the correct whl file.
trans-unit.target: Make sure you choose the correct whl file.

trans-unit.source: For example : If you are using Python 2.7 on a 64 bit machine choose : pymssql‑2.1.1‑cp27‑none‑win_amd64.whl.
trans-unit.target: For example : If you are using Python 2.7 on a 64 bit machine choose : pymssql‑2.1.1‑cp27‑none‑win_amd64.whl.

trans-unit.source: Once you download the .whl file place it in the the C:/Python27 folder.
trans-unit.target: Once you download the .whl file place it in the the C:/Python27 folder.

trans-unit.source: Now install the pymssql driver using pip from command line.
trans-unit.target: Now install the pymssql driver using pip from command line.

trans-unit.source: cd into C:/Python27 and run the following
trans-unit.target: cd into C:/Python27 and run the following

trans-unit.source: Instructions to enable the use pip can be found <linkText>here</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: Instructions to enable the use pip can be found <linkText>here</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: See the <linkText>Getting Started Topic</linkText><title></title> to learn how to create a sample database and retrieve your connection string.
trans-unit.target: See the <linkText>Getting Started Topic</linkText><title></title> to learn how to create a sample database and retrieve your connection string.

trans-unit.source: It is important you follow the guide to create an AdventureWorks database template.
trans-unit.target: It is important you follow the guide to create an AdventureWorks database template.

trans-unit.source: The samples shown below only work with the AdventureWorks schema.
trans-unit.target: The samples shown below only work with the AdventureWorks schema.

trans-unit.source: The <linkText>pymssql.connect</linkText><title></title> function is used to connect to SQL Database.
trans-unit.target: The <linkText>pymssql.connect</linkText><title></title> function is used to connect to SQL Database.

trans-unit.source: The <linkText>cursor.execute</linkText><title></title> function can be used to retrieve a result set from a query against SQL Database.
trans-unit.target: The <linkText>cursor.execute</linkText><title></title> function can be used to retrieve a result set from a query against SQL Database.

trans-unit.source: This function essentially accepts any query and returns a result set which can be iterated over with the use of <linkText>cursor.fetchone()</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: This function essentially accepts any query and returns a result set which can be iterated over with the use of <linkText>cursor.fetchone()</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: In SQL Database the <linkText>IDENTITY</linkText><title></title> property and the <linkText>SEQUENCE</linkText><title></title> object can be used to auto-generate <linkText>primary key</linkText><title></title> values.
trans-unit.target: In SQL Database the <linkText>IDENTITY</linkText><title></title> property and the <linkText>SEQUENCE</linkText><title></title> object can be used to auto-generate <linkText>primary key</linkText><title></title> values.

trans-unit.source: This code example demonstrates the use of transactions in which you:
trans-unit.target: This code example demonstrates the use of transactions in which you:

trans-unit.source: -Begin a transaction
trans-unit.target: -Begin a transaction

trans-unit.source: -Insert a row of data
trans-unit.target: -Insert a row of data

trans-unit.source: -Rollback your transaction to undo the insert
trans-unit.target: -Rollback your transaction to undo the insert
